name: Aero's endless flap
description:
Flap your way through the endless amounts of trees and learn the story of Aero the lemonduck

Aero's Endless Flap is an endless scroller game based off of  the  arcade mobile game "Flappy Bird" from  2013.

SpaceBar to flap

font used: ZyzolShadow

Font Author: Szymon Furjan

https://www.fontspace.com/zyzol-font-f67557
